00152 // SaveMapTempFilesToSavedGameFile() Looks for and opens all Map Modification files.  It add each mod file to the save game file.
00153 BOOLEAN SaveMapTempFilesToSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
00154 {
00155       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *TempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
00156       INT16 sMapX;
00157       INT16 sMapY;
00158 
00159 
00160       //Save the current sectors open temp files to the disk
00161 //    SaveCurrentSectorsItemsToTempItemFile();
00162 
00163       //
00164       //Loop though all the array elements to see if there is a data file to be saved
00165       //
00166 
00167       //First look through the above ground sectors
00168       for( sMapY=1; sMapY<=16; sMapY++ )
00169       {
00170             for( sMapX=1; sMapX<=16; sMapX++ )
00171             {
00172                   //Save the Temp Item Files to the saved game file
00173                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00174                   {
00175                         AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00176                   }
00177 
00178                   // Save the Rotting Corpse Temp file to the saved game file
00179                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00180                   {
00181                         AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00182                   }
00183 
00184 
00185                   // Save the Map Modifications Temp file to the saved game file
00186                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00187                   {
00188                         AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00189                   }
00190 
00191                   //Save the Door Table temp file to the saved game file
00192                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_DOOR_TABLE_TEMP_FILES_EXISTS )
00193                   {
00194                         AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_DOOR_TABLE_TEMP_FILES_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00195                   }
00196 
00197                   //Save the revealed status temp file to the saved game file
00198                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00199                   {
00200                         AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00201                   }
00202 
00203                   //Save the door status temp file to the saved game file
00204                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_DOOR_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00205                   {
00206                         AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_DOOR_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00207                   }
00208 
00209                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_ENEMY_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00210                   {
00211                         AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_ENEMY_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00212                   }
00213 
00214                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_CIV_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00215                   {
00216                         AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_CIV_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00217                   }
00218 
00219                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00220                   {
00221                         AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00222                   }
00223 
00224                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00225                   {
00226                         AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00227                   }
00228 
00229 
00230                   //if any other file is to be saved
00231             }
00232       }
00233 
00234 
00235       //then look throught all the underground sectors
00236       while( TempNode )
00237       {
00238             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00239             {
00240                   AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00241             }
00242 
00243             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00244             {
00245                   AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00246             }
00247 
00248             // Save the Map Modifications Temp file to the saved game file
00249             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00250             {
00251                   AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00252             }
00253 
00254             
00255             //Save the door table to the saved game file
00256             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_DOOR_TABLE_TEMP_FILES_EXISTS )
00257             {
00258                   AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_DOOR_TABLE_TEMP_FILES_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00259             }
00260 
00261             //Save the revealed status temp file to the saved game file
00262             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00263             {
00264                   AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00265             }
00266 
00267             //Save the door status temp file to the saved game file
00268             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_DOOR_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00269             {
00270                   AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_DOOR_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00271             }
00272 
00273             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_ENEMY_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00274             {
00275                   AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_ENEMY_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00276             }
00277 
00278             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_CIV_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00279             {
00280                   AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_CIV_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00281             }
00282 
00283             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00284             {
00285                   AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00286             }
00287 
00288             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00289             {
00290                   AddTempFileToSavedGame( hFile, SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00291             }
00292 
00293             //ttt
00294 
00295             
00296             TempNode = TempNode->next;
00297       }
00298 
00299 
00300       return( TRUE );
00301 }

00304 // LoadMapTempFilesFromSavedGameFile() loads all the temp files from the saved game file and writes them into the temp directory
00305 BOOLEAN     LoadMapTempFilesFromSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
00306 {
00307       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *TempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
00308       INT16 sMapX;
00309       INT16 sMapY;
00310       UINT32      uiPercentage;
00311       UINT32            iCounter = 0;
00312 
00313 
00314       // HACK FOR GABBY
00315       if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME) && guiSaveGameVersion < 81 )
00316       {
00317             if ( gMercProfiles[ GABBY ].bMercStatus != MERC_IS_DEAD )
00318             {
00319                   // turn off alternate flags for the sectors he could be in
00320                   // randomly place him in one of the two possible sectors
00321                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR( 14, MAP_ROW_L ) ].uiFlags &= ~SF_USE_ALTERNATE_MAP;
00322                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR(  8, MAP_ROW_L ) ].uiFlags &= ~SF_USE_ALTERNATE_MAP;
00323 
00324                   if ( Random( 2 ) )
00325                   {
00326                         SectorInfo[ SECTOR( 11, MAP_ROW_H ) ].uiFlags |= SF_USE_ALTERNATE_MAP;
00327                         gMercProfiles[ GABBY ].sSectorX = 11;
00328                         gMercProfiles[ GABBY ].sSectorY = MAP_ROW_H;
00329                   }
00330                   else
00331                   {
00332                         SectorInfo[ SECTOR(  4, MAP_ROW_I ) ].uiFlags |= SF_USE_ALTERNATE_MAP;
00333                         gMercProfiles[ GABBY ].sSectorX = 4;
00334                         gMercProfiles[ GABBY ].sSectorY = MAP_ROW_I;
00335                   }
00336             }
00337       }
00338 
00339       //
00340       //Loop though all the array elements to see if there is a data file to be loaded
00341       //
00342 
00343       //First look through the above ground sectors
00344       for( sMapY=1; sMapY<=16; sMapY++ )
00345       {
00346             for( sMapX=1; sMapX<=16; sMapX++ )
00347             {
00348                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00349                   {
00350                         RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00351 
00352                         //sync up the temp file data to the sector structure data
00353                         SynchronizeItemTempFileVisbleItemsToSectorInfoVisbleItems( sMapX, sMapY, 0, TRUE );
00354                   }
00355 
00356                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00357                   {
00358                         RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00359                   }
00360 
00361                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00362                   {
00363                         RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00364                   }
00365 
00366                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_DOOR_TABLE_TEMP_FILES_EXISTS )
00367                   {
00368                         RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_DOOR_TABLE_TEMP_FILES_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00369                   }
00370 
00371                   //Get the revealed status temp file From the saved game file
00372                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00373                   {
00374                         RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00375                   }
00376 
00377                   //Get the revealed status temp file From the saved game file
00378                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_DOOR_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00379                   {
00380                         RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_DOOR_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00381                   }
00382 
00383                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_ENEMY_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00384                   {
00385                         RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_ENEMY_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00386                   }
00387 
00388                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_CIV_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00389                   {
00390                         RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_CIV_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00391                         if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME) && guiSaveGameVersion < 78 )
00392                         {
00393                               INT8 pMapName[ 128 ];
00394 
00395                               // KILL IT!!! KILL KIT!!!! IT IS CORRUPTED!!!
00396                               GetMapTempFileName( SF_CIV_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, (STR)pMapName, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00397                               FileDelete( (STR)pMapName );
00398 
00399                               // turn off the flag
00400                               SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags &= (~SF_CIV_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS);
00401 
00402                         }
00403                   }
00404 
00405                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00406                   {
00407                         RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00408                   }
00409 
00410                   if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00411                   {
00412                         RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
00413                   }
00414 
00415 
00416                   //if any other file is to be saved
00417 
00418                   iCounter++;
00419 
00420                   //update the progress bar
00421                   uiPercentage = (iCounter * 100) / (255);
00422 
00423                   RenderProgressBar( 0, uiPercentage );
00424             }
00425       }
00426 
00427 
00428       //then look throught all the underground sectors
00429       while( TempNode )
00430       {
00431             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00432             {
00433                   RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00434 
00435                   //sync up the temp file data to the sector structure data
00436                   SynchronizeItemTempFileVisbleItemsToSectorInfoVisbleItems( TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ, TRUE );
00437             }
00438 
00439             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00440             {
00441                   RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00442             }
00443 
00444 
00445             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
00446             {
00447                   RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );
00448             }
00449 
00450             if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_DOOR_TABLE_TEMP_FILES_EXISTS )
00451             {
00452                   RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_DOOR_TABLE_TEMP_FILES_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );

00458                   RetrieveTempFileFromSavedGame( hFile, SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, TempNode->ubSectorX, TempNode->ubSectorY, TempNode->ubSectorZ );

00502 //ttt
00503       return( TRUE );
00504 }

00509 
00510 BOOLEAN SaveWorldItemsToTempItemFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, UINT32 uiNumberOfItems, WORLDITEM *pData )
00511 {
00512       HWFILE      hFile;
00513       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
00514       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00515 
00516       GetMapTempFileName( SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00517 
00518       //Open the file for writing, Create it if it doesnt exist
00519       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00520       if( hFile == 0 )
00521       {
00522             //Error opening map modification file
00523             return( FALSE );
00524       }
00525 
00526       //Save the size of the ITem table
00527       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumberOfItems, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00528       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00529       {
00530             //Error Writing size of array to disk
00531             FileClose( hFile );
00532             return( FALSE );
00533       }
00534 
00535 
00536       //if there are items to save..
00537       if( uiNumberOfItems != 0 )
00538       {
00539             //Save the ITem array
00540             FileWrite( hFile, pData, uiNumberOfItems * sizeof( WORLDITEM ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00541             if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiNumberOfItems * sizeof( WORLDITEM ) )
00542             {
00543                   //Error Writing size of array to disk
00544                   FileClose( hFile );
00545                   return( FALSE );
00546             }
00547       }
00548 
00549       FileClose( hFile );
00550 
00551       SetSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
00552 
00553       SynchronizeItemTempFileVisbleItemsToSectorInfoVisbleItems( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, FALSE );
00554 
00555       return( TRUE );
00556 }
00557 
00558 
00559 
00560 BOOLEAN LoadWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, WORLDITEM *pData )
00561 {
00562       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
00563       HWFILE      hFile;
00564       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00565       UINT32 uiNumberOfItems=0;
00566 
00567       GetMapTempFileName( SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00568 
00569 
00570       //Check to see if the file exists
00571       if( !FileExists( zMapName ) )
00572       {
00573             //If the file doesnt exists, its no problem.
00574             return( TRUE );
00575       }
00576 
00577       //Open the file for reading
00578       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
00579       if( hFile == 0 )
00580       {
00581             //Error opening map modification file,
00582             return( FALSE );
00583       }
00584 
00585 
00586       // Load the size of the World ITem table
00587       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumberOfItems, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00588       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00589       {
00590             //Error Writing size of array to disk
00591             FileClose( hFile );
00592             return( FALSE );
00593       }
00594 
00595       // Load the World ITem table
00596       FileRead( hFile, pData, uiNumberOfItems * sizeof( WORLDITEM ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00597       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiNumberOfItems * sizeof( WORLDITEM ) )
00598       {
00599             //Error Writing size of array to disk
00600             FileClose( hFile );
00601             return( FALSE );
00602       }
00603 
00604       FileClose( hFile );
00605 
00606       return( TRUE );
00607 }
00608 
00609 
00610 BOOLEAN GetNumberOfWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, UINT32 *pSizeOfData, BOOLEAN fIfEmptyCreate )
00611 {
00612       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
00613       HWFILE      hFile;
00614       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00615       UINT32      uiNumberOfItems=0;
00616 
00617       GetMapTempFileName( SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00618 
00619 
00620       //Check if the file DOESNT exists
00621       if( !FileExistsNoDB( zMapName ) )
00622       {
00623             if( fIfEmptyCreate )
00624             {
00625                   WORLDITEM TempWorldItems[ 10 ];
00626                   UINT32            uiNumberOfItems = 10;
00627                   UINT32            uiNumBytesWritten=0;
00628 
00629                   //If the file doesnt exists, create a file that has an initial amount of Items
00630                   hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00631                   if( hFile == 0 )
00632                   {
00633                         //Error opening item modification file
00634                         return( FALSE );
00635                   }
00636 
00637                   memset( TempWorldItems, 0, ( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * 10 ) );
00638 
00639                   //write the the number of item in the maps item file
00640                   FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumberOfItems, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00641                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00642                   {
00643                         //Error Writing size of array to disk
00644                         FileClose( hFile );
00645                         return( FALSE );
00646                   }
00647 
00648                   //write the the number of item in the maps item file
00649                   FileWrite( hFile, TempWorldItems, uiNumberOfItems * sizeof( WORLDITEM ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00650                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiNumberOfItems * sizeof( WORLDITEM ) )
00651                   {
00652                         //Error Writing size of array to disk
00653                         FileClose( hFile );
00654                         return( FALSE );
00655                   }
00656 
00657                   //Close the file
00658                   FileClose( hFile );
00659             }
00660             else
00661             {
00662                   // the file doesnt exist
00663                   *pSizeOfData = 0;
00664 
00665                   return( TRUE );
00666             }
00667       }
00668 
00669 
00670       //Open the file for reading, if it exists
00671       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
00672       if( hFile == 0 )
00673       {
00674             //Error opening map modification file
00675             return( FALSE );
00676       }
00677 
00678 
00679       // Load the size of the World ITem table
00680       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumberOfItems, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00681       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00682       {
00683             //Error Writing size of array to disk
00684             FileClose( hFile );
00685             return( FALSE );
00686       }
00687 
00688       *pSizeOfData = uiNumberOfItems;
00689 
00690       FileClose( hFile );
00691 
00692       return( TRUE );
00693 }
00694 
00695 
00696 BOOLEAN AddItemsToUnLoadedSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, INT16 sGridNo, UINT32 uiNumberOfItemsToAdd, OBJECTTYPE *pObject, UINT8 ubLevel, UINT16 usFlags, INT8 bRenderZHeightAboveLevel, INT8 bVisible, BOOLEAN fReplaceEntireFile )
00697 {
00698       UINT32      uiNumberOfItems=0;
00699       WORLDITEM *pWorldItems;
00700       UINT32      cnt;
00701       UINT32      uiLoop1=0;
00702 
00703 
00704       if( !GetNumberOfWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, &uiNumberOfItems, TRUE ) )
00705       {
00706             //Errror getting the numbers of the items from the sector
00707             return( FALSE );
00708       }
00709 
00710       //Allocate memeory for the item
00711       pWorldItems = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumberOfItems );
00712       if( pWorldItems == NULL )
00713       {
00714             //Error Allocating memory for the temp item array
00715             return( FALSE );
00716       }
00717 
00718       //Clear the memory
00719       memset( pWorldItems, 0, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumberOfItems );
00720 
00721       //Load in the sectors Item Info
00722       if( !LoadWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, pWorldItems ) )
00723       {
00724             //error reading in the items from the Item mod file 
00725             MemFree( pWorldItems );
00726             return( FALSE );
00727       }
00728 
00729 
00730       //if we are to replace the entire file
00731       if( fReplaceEntireFile )
00732       {
00733             //first loop through and mark all entries that they dont exists
00734             for( cnt=0; cnt<uiNumberOfItems; cnt++)
00735                   pWorldItems[ cnt ].fExists = FALSE;
00736 
00737             //Now delete the item temp file
00738             DeleteTempItemMapFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00739       }
00740 
00741       //loop through all the objects to add
00742       for( uiLoop1=0; uiLoop1 < uiNumberOfItemsToAdd; uiLoop1++)
00743       {
00744             //Loop through the array to see if there is a free spot to add an item to it
00745             for( cnt=0; cnt < uiNumberOfItems; cnt++)
00746             {
00747                   if( pWorldItems[ cnt ].fExists == FALSE )
00748                   {
00749                         //We have found a free spot, break
00750                         break;
00751                   }
00752             }
00753 
00754             if( cnt == ( uiNumberOfItems ) )
00755             {
00756                   //Error, there wasnt a free spot.  Reallocate memory for the array
00757                   pWorldItems = (WORLDITEM *) MemRealloc( pWorldItems, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * (uiNumberOfItems + 1 ) );
00758                   if( pWorldItems == NULL )
00759                   {
00760                         //error realloctin memory
00761                         return( FALSE );
00762                   }
00763 
00764                   //Increment the total number of item in the array
00765                   uiNumberOfItems++;
00766 
00767                   //set the spot were the item is to be added
00768                   cnt = uiNumberOfItems - 1;
00769             }
00770 
00771             pWorldItems[ cnt ].fExists = TRUE;
00772             pWorldItems[ cnt ].sGridNo = sGridNo;
00773             pWorldItems[ cnt ].ubLevel = ubLevel;
00774             pWorldItems[ cnt ].usFlags = usFlags;
00775             pWorldItems[ cnt ].bVisible = bVisible;
00776             pWorldItems[ cnt ].bRenderZHeightAboveLevel = bRenderZHeightAboveLevel;
00777 
00778 
00779             //Check
00780             if( sGridNo == NOWHERE && !( pWorldItems[ cnt ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_GRIDNO_NOT_SET_USE_ENTRY_POINT ) )
00781             {
00782                   pWorldItems[ cnt ].usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_GRIDNO_NOT_SET_USE_ENTRY_POINT;
00783 
00784                   // Display warning.....
00785                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Error: Trying to add item ( %d: %s ) to invalid gridno in unloaded sector. Please Report.", pWorldItems[ cnt ].o.usItem, ItemNames[pWorldItems[ cnt ].o.usItem] );
00786             }
00787 
00788             
00789             memcpy( &(pWorldItems[ cnt ].o), &pObject[uiLoop1], sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
00790       }
00791 
00792       //Save the Items to the the file
00793       SaveWorldItemsToTempItemFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, uiNumberOfItems, pWorldItems );
00794 
00795 
00796       //Free the memory used to load in the item array
00797       MemFree( pWorldItems );
00798 
00799       return( TRUE );
00800 }
00801 
00802 extern BOOLEAN gfInMeanwhile;
00803 
00804 BOOLEAN SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile( )
00805 {
00806       BOOLEAN fShouldBeInMeanwhile = FALSE;
00807       if( gfWasInMeanwhile )
00808       { //Don't save a temp file for the meanwhile scene map.
00809             gfWasInMeanwhile = FALSE;
00810             return TRUE;
00811       }
00812       else if( AreInMeanwhile() )
00813       {
00814             gfInMeanwhile = FALSE;
00815             fShouldBeInMeanwhile = TRUE;
00816       }
00817 
00818       //If we havent been to tactical yet
00819       if( ( gWorldSectorX == 0 ) && ( gWorldSectorY == 0 ) )
00820       {
00821             return( TRUE );
00822       }
00823 
00824 
00825       //Save the Blood, smell and the revealed status for map elements
00826       SaveBloodSmellAndRevealedStatesFromMapToTempFile();
00827       
00828       // handle all reachable before save
00829       HandleAllReachAbleItemsInTheSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00830 
00831 
00832 
00833       //Save the Items to the the file
00834       if( !SaveWorldItemsToTempItemFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, guiNumWorldItems, gWorldItems ) )
00835       {
00836             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile:  failed in SaveWorldItemsToTempItemFile()" ) );
00837             return( FALSE );
00838       }
00839 
00840       //Save the rotting corpse array to the temp rotting corpse file
00841       if( !SaveRottingCorpsesToTempCorpseFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
00842       {
00843             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile:  failed in SaveRottingCorpsesToTempCorpseFile()" ) );
00844             return( FALSE );
00845       }
00846 
00847       //save the Doortable array to the temp door map file 
00848       if( !SaveDoorTableToDoorTableTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
00849       {
00850             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile:  failed in SaveDoorTableToDoorTableTempFile()" ) );
00851             return( FALSE );
00852       }
00853 
00854       //save the 'revealed'status of the tiles
00855       if( !SaveRevealedStatusArrayToRevealedTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
00856       {
00857             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile:  failed in SaveRevealedStatusArrayToRevealedTempFile()" ) );
00858             return( FALSE );
00859       }
00860 
00861       //save the door open status to the saved game file
00862       if( !SaveDoorStatusArrayToDoorStatusTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
00863       {
00864             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile:  failed in SaveDoorStatusArrayToDoorStatusTempFile()" ) );
00865             return( FALSE );
00866       }
00867 
00868       //Save the enemies to the temp file
00869       if( !NewWayOfSavingEnemyAndCivliansToTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, TRUE, FALSE ) )
00870       {
00871             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile:  failed in NewWayOfSavingEnemyAndCivliansToTempFile( Enemy, Creature Team )" ) );
00872             return( FALSE );
00873       }
00874 
00875       //Save the civilian info to the temp file
00876       if( !NewWayOfSavingEnemyAndCivliansToTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, FALSE, FALSE ) )
00877       {
00878             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile:  failed in NewWayOfSavingEnemyAndCivliansToTempFile( Civ Team )" ) );
00879             return( FALSE );
00880       }
00881 
00882       //Save the smoke effects info to the temp file
00883       if( !SaveSmokeEffectsToMapTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
00884       {
00885             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile:  failed in SaveSmokeEffectsToMapTempFile" ) );
00886             return( FALSE );
00887       }
00888 
00889       //Save the smoke effects info to the temp file
00890       if( !SaveLightEffectsToMapTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
00891       {
00892             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile:  failed in SaveLightEffectsToMapTempFile" ) );
00893             return( FALSE );
00894       }
00895 
00896 
00897 //ttt
00898 
00899       //Save any other info here
00900 
00901 
00902       //Save certain information from the NPC's soldier structure to the Merc structure
00903       SaveNPCInformationToProfileStruct( );
00904 
00905       //Save the time the player was last in the sector
00906       SetLastTimePlayerWasInSector();
00907 
00908 
00909       if( fShouldBeInMeanwhile )
00910       {
00911             gfInMeanwhile = TRUE;
00912       }
00913 
00914       return( TRUE );
00915 }
00916 
00917 
00918 void HandleAllReachAbleItemsInTheSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
00919 {
00920       // find out which items in the list are reachable
00921       UINT32 uiCounter = 0;
00922       UINT8 ubDir, ubMovementCost;
00923       BOOLEAN fReachable = FALSE;
00924       INT16 sGridNo = NOWHERE, sGridNo2 = NOWHERE;
00925       INT16 sNewLoc;
00926 
00927       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00928       BOOLEAN     fSecondary = FALSE;
00929 
00930       if ( guiNumWorldItems == 0 )
00931       {
00932             return;
00933       }
00934 
00935       if ( gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo != -1 )
00936       {
00937             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo;
00938       }
00939       else if ( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
00940       {
00941             // use any!
00942             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;
00943       }
00944       else if ( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
00945       {
00946             // use any!
00947             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sEastGridNo;
00948       }
00949       else if ( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
00950       {
00951             // use any!
00952             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo;
00953       }
00954       else if ( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
00955       {
00956             // use any!
00957             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sWestGridNo;
00958       }
00959       else
00960       {
00961             AssertMsg( 0, String( "Map %c%d_b%d does not have any entry points!", 'A' + gWorldSectorY - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ ) );
00962             return;
00963       }
00964             
00965       if ( gMapInformation.sIsolatedGridNo != -1 )
00966       {
00967             sGridNo2 = gMapInformation.sIsolatedGridNo;
00968 
00969             for( uiCounter = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; uiCounter < gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; uiCounter++ )
00970             {
00971                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ uiCounter ];
00972                   if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife > 0 && pSoldier->sSectorX == sSectorX && pSoldier->sSectorY == sSectorY && pSoldier->bSectorZ == bSectorZ )
00973                   {
00974                         if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo2, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, 0 ) )
00975                         {
00976                               fSecondary = TRUE;
00977                               break;
00978                         }
00979                   }
00980             }
00981 
00982             if ( !fSecondary )
00983             {
00984                   sGridNo2 = NOWHERE;
00985             }
00986 
00987       }
00988 
00989       GlobalItemsReachableTest( sGridNo, sGridNo2 );
00990 
00991       for( uiCounter = 0; uiCounter < guiNumWorldItems; uiCounter++ )
00992       {
00993 
00994             // reset reachablity
00995             fReachable = FALSE;
00996             
00997             // item doesn't exist, ignore it
00998             if( gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].fExists == FALSE )
00999             {
01000                   continue;
01001             }
01002 
01003             // if the item is trapped then flag it as unreachable, period
01004             if ( gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].o.bTrap > 0 ) 
01005             {
01006                   fReachable = FALSE;
01007             }
01008             else if ( ItemTypeExistsAtLocation( gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].sGridNo, OWNERSHIP, gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].ubLevel, NULL ) )
01009             {
01010                   fReachable = FALSE;
01011             }
01012             else if ( gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].o.usItem == CHALICE )
01013             {
01014                   fReachable = FALSE;
01015             }
01016             else if ( gpWorldLevelData[ gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE )
01017             {
01018                   // the gridno itself is reachable so the item is reachable
01019                   fReachable = TRUE;
01020             }
01021             else if ( gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].ubLevel > 0 ) 
01022             {
01023                   // items on roofs are always reachable
01024                   fReachable = TRUE;
01025             }
01026             else
01027             {
01028                   // check the 4 grids around the item, if any is reachable...then the item is reachable
01029                   for ( ubDir = 0; ubDir < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; ubDir += 2 )
01030                   {
01031                         sNewLoc = NewGridNo( gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].sGridNo, DirectionInc( ubDir ) );
01032                         if ( sNewLoc != gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].sGridNo )
01033                         {
01034                               // then it's a valid gridno, so test it 
01035                               // requires non-wall movement cost from one location to the other!
01036                               if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sNewLoc ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE )
01037                               {
01038                                     ubMovementCost = gubWorldMovementCosts[ gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].sGridNo ][ gOppositeDirection[ ubDir ] ][ 0 ];
01039                                     // if we find a door movement cost, if the door is open the gridno should be accessible itself
01040                                     if ( ubMovementCost != TRAVELCOST_DOOR && ubMovementCost != TRAVELCOST_WALL )
01041                                     {
01042                                           fReachable = TRUE;
01043                                           break;
01044                                     }
01045                               }
01046                         }
01047                   }
01048             }
01049 
01050             if( fReachable )
01051             {
01052                   gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE;
01053             }
01054             else
01055             {
01056                   gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].usFlags &= ~( WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE );
01057             }
01058       }
01059 }
01060 
01061 
01062 BOOLEAN LoadCurrentSectorsInformationFromTempItemsFile()
01063 {
01064       BOOLEAN fUsedTempFile = FALSE;
01065 
01066       //
01067       // Load in the sectors ITems
01068       //
01069 
01070       if( AreInMeanwhile() )
01071       { //There will never be a temp file for the meanwhile scene, so return TRUE.  However,
01072             //set a flag to not save it either!
01073             gfWasInMeanwhile = TRUE;
01074 
01075             // OK  - this is true except for interrotations - we need that item temp file to be
01076             // processed!
01077             if ( GetMeanwhileID() == INTERROGATION )
01078             {
01079                   //If there is a file, load in the Items array
01080                   if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01081                   {
01082                         if( !LoadAndAddWorldItemsFromTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01083                               return( FALSE );
01084                   }
01085 
01086                   gfWasInMeanwhile = FALSE;
01087             }
01088             return TRUE;
01089       }
01090 
01091       //if we are in an above ground sector
01092 
01093       //If there is a file, load in the Items array
01094       if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01095       {
01096             fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01097             if( !LoadAndAddWorldItemsFromTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01098                   return( FALSE );
01099       }
01100 
01101       //If there is a rotting corpse temp file, load the data from the temp file
01102       if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01103       {
01104             fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01105             if( !LoadRottingCorpsesFromTempCorpseFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01106                   return( FALSE );
01107       }
01108 
01109       //If there is a map modifications file, load the data from the temp file
01110       if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01111       {
01112             fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01113             if( !LoadAllMapChangesFromMapTempFileAndApplyThem( ) )
01114                   return( FALSE );
01115       }
01116 
01117       //if there is a door table temp file, load the data from the temp file
01118       if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_DOOR_TABLE_TEMP_FILES_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01119       {
01120             fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01121             if( !LoadDoorTableFromDoorTableTempFile( ) )
01122                   return( FALSE );
01123       }
01124 
01125       //if there is a revealed status temp file, load the data from the temp file
01126       if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01127       {
01128             fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01129             if( !LoadRevealedStatusArrayFromRevealedTempFile( ) )
01130                   return( FALSE );
01131       }
01132 
01133       //if there is a door status temp file, load the data from the temp file
01134       if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_DOOR_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01135       {
01136             fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01137             if( !LoadDoorStatusArrayFromDoorStatusTempFile( ) )
01138                   return( FALSE );
01139       }
01140 
01141 
01142       //if the save is an older version, use theold way of oading it up
01143       if( guiSavedGameVersion < 57 )
01144       {
01145             if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_ENEMY_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01146             {
01147                   fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01148                   if( !LoadEnemySoldiersFromTempFile( ) )
01149                         return( FALSE );
01150             }
01151       }
01152 
01153       //else use the new way of loading the enemy and civilian placements
01154       else
01155       {
01156             if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_ENEMY_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01157             {
01158                   fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01159                   if( !NewWayOfLoadingEnemySoldiersFromTempFile( ) )
01160                         return( FALSE );
01161             }
01162 
01163             if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_CIV_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01164             {
01165                   fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01166                   if( !NewWayOfLoadingCiviliansFromTempFile( ) )
01167                         return( FALSE );
01168             }
01169       }
01170 
01171       if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01172       {
01173             fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01174             if( !LoadSmokeEffectsFromMapTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01175                   return( FALSE );
01176       }
01177 
01178       if( DoesTempFileExistsForMap( SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01179       {
01180             fUsedTempFile = TRUE;
01181             if( !LoadLightEffectsFromMapTempFile( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01182                   return( FALSE );
01183       }
01184 
01185 //ttt
01186 
01187       // Check to see if any npc are in this sector, if so load up some saved data for them
01188       LoadNPCInformationFromProfileStruct();
01189 
01190       //if we are loading a saved game
01191 //    if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME )
01192       {
01193             //Init the world since we have modified the map
01194             InitLoadedWorld();
01195       }
01196 
01197 
01198       // Get the last time the player was in the sector
01199       guiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded = GetLastTimePlayerWasInSector();
01200 
01201       if( fUsedTempFile )
01202       {
01203 //          ValidateSoldierInitLinks( 3 );
01204       }
01205 
01206 
01207       StripEnemyDetailedPlacementsIfSectorWasPlayerLiberated();
01208 
01209       return( TRUE );
01210 }
01211 
01212 
01213 void SetLastTimePlayerWasInSector()
01214 {
01215       if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
01216             SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX,gWorldSectorY) ].uiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded = GetWorldTotalMin();
01217       else if( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
01218       {
01219             UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pTempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
01220 
01221             pTempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
01222 
01223             //loop through and look for the right underground sector
01224             while( pTempNode )
01225             {
01226                   if( ( pTempNode->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX ) && 
01227                               ( pTempNode->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY ) && 
01228                               ( pTempNode->ubSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01229                   {
01230                         //set the flag indicating that ther is a temp item file exists for the sector
01231                         pTempNode->uiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded = GetWorldTotalMin();
01232                         return;     //break out
01233                   }
01234                   pTempNode = pTempNode->next;
01235             }
01236             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01237             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Failed to Set the 'uiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded' for an underground sector" );
01238             #endif
01239       }
01240 }
01241 
01242 
01243 
01244 UINT32 GetLastTimePlayerWasInSector()
01245 {
01246       if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
01247             return( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX,gWorldSectorY) ].uiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded );
01248       else if( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
01249       {
01250             UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pTempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
01251 
01252             pTempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
01253 
01254             //loop through and look for the right underground sector
01255             while( pTempNode )
01256             {
01257                   if( ( pTempNode->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX ) && 
01258                               ( pTempNode->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY ) && 
01259                               ( pTempNode->ubSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01260                   {
01261                         //set the flag indicating that ther is a temp item file exists for the sector
01262                         return( pTempNode->uiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded );
01263                   }
01264                   pTempNode = pTempNode->next;
01265             }
01266 
01267             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01268             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Failed to Get the 'uiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded' from an underground sector" );
01269             #endif
01270 
01271             return( 0 );
01272       }
01273       return( 0 );
01274 }

01277 
01278 
01279 BOOLEAN LoadAndAddWorldItemsFromTempFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
01280 {
01281       UINT32      uiNumberOfItems=0;
01282       WORLDITEM *pWorldItems = NULL;
01283       UINT32      cnt;
01284   INT16   sNewGridNo;
01285 
01286       //Get the number of items from the file
01287       if( !GetNumberOfWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, &uiNumberOfItems, TRUE ) )
01288       {
01289             //Error getting the numbers of the items from the sector
01290             return( FALSE );
01291       }
01292 
01293       if( uiNumberOfItems )
01294       {
01295             pWorldItems = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumberOfItems );
01296             if( pWorldItems == NULL )
01297             {
01298                   //Error Allocating memory for the temp item array
01299                   return( FALSE );
01300             }
01301       }
01302       else
01303       {
01304             //if there are no items in the temp, the player might have cleared all of them out, check to see
01305             //If we have already been to the sector
01306             if( GetSectorFlagStatus( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_ALREADY_LOADED ) )
01307             {
01308                   //
01309                   //Completly replace the current sectors item table because all the items SHOULD be in the temp file!!
01310                   //
01311 
01312                   //Destroy the current sectors item table
01313                   TrashWorldItems();
01314 
01315                   //Add each item to the pool, handle below, outside of the if
01316             }
01317 
01318             //there are no items in the file
01319             return( TRUE );
01320       }
01321 
01322       //Clear the memory
01323       memset( pWorldItems, 0, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumberOfItems );
01324 
01325       //Load the World Items from the file
01326       if( !LoadWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, pWorldItems ) )
01327             return( FALSE );
01328 
01329 
01330       //If we have already been to the sector
01331       if( GetSectorFlagStatus( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_ALREADY_LOADED ) )
01332       {
01333             //
01334             //Completly replace the current sectors item table because all the items SHOULD be in the temp file!!
01335             //
01336 
01337             //Destroy the current sectors item table
01338             TrashWorldItems();
01339 
01340             //Add each item to the pool, handle below, outside of the if
01341       }
01342 
01343       //
01344       //Append the items in the file with to the current sectors item table
01345       //
01346 
01347       //Loop through all the items loaded from the file
01348       for( cnt=0; cnt< uiNumberOfItems; cnt++)
01349       {
01350             //If the item in the array is valid
01351             if( pWorldItems[cnt].fExists )
01352             {
01353                   //Check the flags to see if we have to find a gridno to place the items at
01354                   if( pWorldItems[cnt].usFlags & WOLRD_ITEM_FIND_SWEETSPOT_FROM_GRIDNO )
01355                   {
01356                     sNewGridNo = FindNearestAvailableGridNoForItem( pWorldItems[cnt].sGridNo, 5 );
01357                     if( sNewGridNo == NOWHERE )
01358                           sNewGridNo = FindNearestAvailableGridNoForItem( pWorldItems[cnt].sGridNo, 15 );
01359 
01360         if ( sNewGridNo != NOWHERE )
01361         {
01362           pWorldItems[cnt].sGridNo = sNewGridNo;
01363         }
01364                   }
01365 
01366                   //If the item has an invalid gridno, use the maps entry point
01367                   if( pWorldItems[cnt].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_GRIDNO_NOT_SET_USE_ENTRY_POINT )
01368                   {
01369                         pWorldItems[cnt].sGridNo = gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo;
01370                   }
01371 
01372                   //add the item to the world
01373                   AddItemToPool( pWorldItems[cnt].sGridNo, &pWorldItems[cnt].o, pWorldItems[cnt].bVisible, pWorldItems[cnt].ubLevel, pWorldItems[cnt].usFlags, pWorldItems[cnt].bRenderZHeightAboveLevel );
01374             }
01375       }
01376 
01377       return( TRUE );
01378 }

01387

01389 
01390       //Save the map temp file to the saved game file
01391       if( !SaveFilesToSavedGame( zMapName, hFile ) )
01392             return( FALSE );
01393 
01394       return( TRUE );
01395 }

01413 
01414 //Deletes the Temp map Directory
01415 BOOLEAN InitTacticalSave( BOOLEAN fCreateTempDir )
01416 {
01417       UINT32      uiRetVal;
01418 
01419       //If the Map Temp directory exists, removes the temp files
01420       uiRetVal = FileGetAttributes( MAPS_DIR );
01421       if( uiRetVal != 0xFFFFFFFF )
01422       {
01423             if( uiRetVal & FILE_ATTRIBUTES_DIRECTORY )
01424             {
01425                   //Erase the directory
01426                   if( !EraseDirectory( MAPS_DIR ) )
01427                   {
01428                         //error erasing the temporary maps directory
01429                   }
01430             }
01431       }
01432       else
01433       {
01434             if( !MakeFileManDirectory( MAPS_DIR ) )
01435             {
01436                   //Erro creating the temp map directory
01437                   AssertMsg( 0, "Error creating the Temp Directory.");
01438             }
01439       }
01440 
01441       if( fCreateTempDir )
01442       {
01443             //Create the initial temp file for the Npc Quote Info
01444             InitTempNpcQuoteInfoForNPCFromTempFile();
01445       }
01446 
01447       return( TRUE );
01448 }

01451 
01452 BOOLEAN SaveRottingCorpsesToTempCorpseFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
01453 {
01454       HWFILE      hFile;
01455       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
01456 //    CHAR8       zTempName[ 128 ];
01457       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
01458       UINT32      uiNumberOfCorpses=0;
01459       INT32       iCount;
01460 
01461 /*
01462       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
01463       GetMapFileName( sMapX,sMapY, bMapZ, zTempName, FALSE );
01464 
01465       //add the 'r' for 'Rotting Corpses' to the front of the map name
01466       sprintf( zMapName, "%s\\r_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
01467 */
01468 
01469       GetMapTempFileName( SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
01470 
01471 
01472       //Open the file for writing, Create it if it doesnt exist
01473       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
01474       if( hFile == 0 )
01475       {
01476             //Error opening map modification file
01477             return( FALSE );
01478       }
01479 
01480 
01481       //Determine how many rotting corpses there are
01482       for(iCount=0; iCount < giNumRottingCorpse; iCount++)
01483       {
01484             if( gRottingCorpse[iCount].fActivated == TRUE )
01485                   uiNumberOfCorpses++;
01486       }
01487 
01488 
01489       //Save the number of the Rotting Corpses array table
01490       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumberOfCorpses, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
01491       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
01492       {
01493             //Error Writing size of array to disk
01494             FileClose( hFile );
01495             return( FALSE );
01496       }
01497 
01498       //Loop through all the carcases in the array and save the active ones
01499       for(iCount=0; iCount < giNumRottingCorpse; iCount++)
01500       {
01501             if( gRottingCorpse[iCount].fActivated == TRUE )
01502             {
01503                   //Save the RottingCorpse info array
01504                   FileWrite( hFile, &gRottingCorpse[iCount].def, sizeof( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
01505                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION ) )
01506                   {
01507                         //Error Writing size of array to disk
01508                         FileClose( hFile );
01509                         return( FALSE );
01510                   }
01511             }
01512       }
01513 
01514       FileClose( hFile );
01515 
01516       // Set the flag indicating that there is a rotting corpse Temp File
01517 //    SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags |= SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS;
01518       SetSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
01519       
01520       return( TRUE );
01521 }
01522 
01523 
01524 BOOLEAN DeleteTempItemMapFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
01525 {
01526       UINT8 bSectorId = 0;
01527 //    CHAR8       zTempName[ 128 ];
01528       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
01529 
01530       // grab the sector id 
01531       bSectorId = SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY );
01532 /*
01533       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
01534       GetMapFileName( sMapX,sMapY, bMapZ, zTempName, FALSE );
01535 
01536       sprintf( zMapName, "%s\\r_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
01537 */
01538       GetMapTempFileName( SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
01539 
01540       //Check to see if the file exists
01541       if( !FileExists( zMapName ) )
01542       {
01543             //If the file doesnt exists, its no problem.
01544             return( TRUE );
01545       }
01546 
01547       // the sector info flag being reset
01548       ReSetSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
01549 
01550       return( TRUE );
01551 }
01552 
01553 
01554 BOOLEAN LoadRottingCorpsesFromTempCorpseFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
01555 {
01556       HWFILE      hFile;
01557       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
01558 //    CHAR8       zTempName[ 128 ];
01559       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
01560       UINT32      uiNumberOfCorpses=0;
01561       UINT32            cnt;
01562       ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION           def;
01563   BOOLEAN                     fDontAddCorpse = FALSE;
01564   INT8                        bTownId;
01565 
01566   
01567       //Delete the existing rotting corpse array
01568       RemoveCorpses( );
01569 /*
01570       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
01571       GetMapFileName( sMapX,sMapY, bMapZ, zTempName, FALSE );
01572 
01573       sprintf( zMapName, "%s\\r_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
01574 */
01575       GetMapTempFileName( SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
01576 
01577 
01578       //Check to see if the file exists
01579       if( !FileExists( zMapName ) )
01580       {
01581             //If the file doesnt exists, its no problem.
01582             return( TRUE );
01583       }
01584 
01585       //Open the file for reading
01586       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
01587       if( hFile == 0 )
01588       {
01589             //Error opening map modification file,
01590             return( FALSE );
01591       }
01592 
01593       // Load the number of Rotting corpses
01594       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumberOfCorpses, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01595       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
01596       {
01597             //Error Writing size of array to disk
01598             FileClose( hFile );
01599             return( FALSE );
01600       }
01601 
01602   // Get town ID for use later....
01603       bTownId = GetTownIdForSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01604 
01605       for( cnt=0; cnt<uiNumberOfCorpses; cnt++ )
01606       {
01607     fDontAddCorpse = FALSE;
01608 
01609             // Load the Rotting corpses info
01610             FileRead( hFile, &def, sizeof( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01611             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION ) )
01612             {
01613                   //Error Writing size of array to disk
01614                   FileClose( hFile );
01615                   return( FALSE );
01616             }
01617 
01618 
01619             //Check the flags to see if we have to find a gridno to place the rotting corpses at
01620             if( def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_FIND_SWEETSPOT_FROM_GRIDNO )
01621             {
01622                   def.sGridNo = FindNearestAvailableGridNoForCorpse( &def, 5 );
01623                   if( def.sGridNo == NOWHERE )
01624                         def.sGridNo = FindNearestAvailableGridNoForCorpse( &def, 15 );
01625 
01626       // ATE: Here we still could have a bad location, but send in NOWHERE
01627       // to corpse function anyway, 'cause it will iwth not drop it or use
01628       // a map edgepoint....
01629             }
01630             else if( def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_NORTH_ENTRY_POINT )
01631             {
01632                   def.sGridNo = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;
01633             }
01634             else if( def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_SOUTH_ENTRY_POINT )
01635             {
01636                   def.sGridNo = gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo;;
01637             }
01638             else if( def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_EAST_ENTRY_POINT )
01639             {
01640                   def.sGridNo = gMapInformation.sEastGridNo;
01641             }
01642             else if( def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_WEST_ENTRY_POINT )
01643             {
01644                   def.sGridNo = gMapInformation.sWestGridNo;
01645             }
01646             //Recalculate the dx,dy info
01647             def.dXPos = CenterX( def.sGridNo );
01648             def.dYPos = CenterY( def.sGridNo );
01649 
01650     // If not from loading a save....
01651         if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01652     {
01653       // ATE: Don't place corpses if
01654       // a ) in a town and b) indoors
01655       if ( gbWorldSectorZ == 0 )
01656       {
01657         if ( bTownId != BLANK_SECTOR )
01658         {
01659           // Are we indoors?
01660           if( FloorAtGridNo( def.sGridNo ) )
01661           {
01662              // OK, finally, check TOC vs game time to see if at least some time has passed
01663                  if ( ( GetWorldTotalMin( ) - def.uiTimeOfDeath ) >= 30 )
01664              {
01665                 fDontAddCorpse = TRUE;
01666              }
01667           }
01668         }
01669       }
01670     }
01671 
01672     if ( !fDontAddCorpse )
01673     {
01674               //add the rotting corpse info
01675               if( AddRottingCorpse( &def ) == -1 )
01676               {
01677                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Failed to add a corpse to GridNo # %d", def.sGridNo ) );
01678 
01679   /*
01680                     Assert( 0 );
01681                     FileClose( hFile );
01682                     return( FALSE );
01683   */
01684               }
01685     }
01686       }
01687 
01688       FileClose( hFile );
01689 
01690       //Check to see if we have to start decomposing the corpses
01691       HandleRottingCorpses( );
01692 
01693       return( TRUE );
01694 }
01695

01698 
01699 BOOLEAN AddWorldItemsToUnLoadedSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, INT16 sGridNo, UINT32 uiNumberOfItems, WORLDITEM *pWorldItem, BOOLEAN fOverWrite )
01700 {
01701       UINT32 uiLoop;
01702       BOOLEAN fLoop=fOverWrite;
01703 
01704       for( uiLoop=0; uiLoop<uiNumberOfItems; uiLoop++)
01705       {
01706             //If the item exists
01707             if( pWorldItem[uiLoop].fExists )
01708             {
01709                   AddItemsToUnLoadedSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, pWorldItem[uiLoop].sGridNo, 1, &pWorldItem[ uiLoop ].o, pWorldItem[ uiLoop ].ubLevel, pWorldItem[ uiLoop ].usFlags, pWorldItem[ uiLoop ].bRenderZHeightAboveLevel, pWorldItem[ uiLoop ].bVisible, fLoop );
01710             
01711                   fLoop = FALSE;
01712             }
01713       }
01714 
01715       return( TRUE );
01716 }
01717 
01718 void SaveNPCInformationToProfileStruct( )
01719 {
01720       UINT32                                                cnt;  
01721       SOLDIERTYPE *                             pSoldier;
01722       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *           pProfile;
01723 
01724       //Loop through the active NPC's
01725 
01726       // Only do this on save now... on traversal this is handled in the strategic code
01727       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01728       {
01729             return;
01730       }
01731       
01732       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++)
01733       {     
01734             pSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
01735 
01736             //if it is an active NPC
01737             if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM )
01738             {
01739                   //Save Temp Npc Quote Info array
01740                   SaveTempNpcQuoteInfoForNPCToTempFile( pSoldier->ubProfile );
01741 
01742                   pProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ]);
01743 
01744                   pProfile->ubQuoteActionID = pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID;
01745                   pProfile->ubQuoteRecord = pSoldier->ubQuoteRecord;
01746 
01747                   // if the merc is NOT added due to flag set, return
01748                   if ( pProfile->ubMiscFlags2 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_DONT_ADD_TO_SECTOR )
01749                   {
01750                         continue;
01751                   }
01752 
01753                   if ( pProfile->ubMiscFlags3 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_PERMANENT_INSERTION_CODE )               
01754                   {
01755                         continue;
01756                   }
01757 
01758                   pProfile->fUseProfileInsertionInfo = TRUE;
01759                   pProfile->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01760                   //if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME )
01761                   //{
01762                         // if we are saving the game, save the NPC's current location
01763                         pProfile->usStrategicInsertionData = pSoldier->sGridNo;
01764                   //}
01765                   /*
01766                   else
01767                   {
01768                         // If the NPC is moving, save the final destination, else save the current location
01769                         if ( pSoldier->sFinalDestination != pSoldier->sGridNo )
01770                         {
01771                               pProfile->usStrategicInsertionData = pSoldier->sFinalDestination;
01772                         }
01773                         else
01774                         {
01775                               pProfile->usStrategicInsertionData = pSoldier->sGridNo;
01776                         }
01777                   }
01778                   */
01779 
01780             }
01781       }
01782 }

01922 
01923 BOOLEAN GetNumberOfActiveWorldItemsFromTempFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, UINT32 *pNumberOfData )
01924 {
01925       UINT32      uiNumberOfItems=0;
01926       WORLDITEM *pWorldItems;
01927       UINT32      cnt;
01928       UINT32      uiNumberOfActive=0;
01929       BOOLEAN     fFileLoaded = FALSE;
01930       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *TempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
01931 
01932 
01933       //
01934       // Load in the sectors ITems
01935       //
01936 
01937       //If there is a file, load in the Items array
01938       if( bMapZ  == 0 )
01939       {
01940             if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
01941                   fFileLoaded = TRUE;
01942       }
01943       else
01944       {
01945             while( TempNode )
01946             {
01947                   if( TempNode->ubSectorX == sMapX && TempNode->ubSectorY == sMapY && TempNode->ubSectorZ == bMapZ )
01948                   {
01949                         if( TempNode->uiFlags & SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS )
01950                               fFileLoaded = TRUE;
01951 
01952                         break;
01953                   }
01954                   
01955                   TempNode = TempNode->next;
01956             }
01957       }
01958             
01959       if( fFileLoaded )
01960       {
01961             //Get the number of items from the file
01962             if( !GetNumberOfWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, &uiNumberOfItems, TRUE ) )
01963             {
01964                   //Error getting the numbers of the items from the sector
01965                   return( FALSE );
01966             }
01967 
01968             //If there items in the data file
01969             if( uiNumberOfItems != 0 )
01970             {
01971                   pWorldItems = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumberOfItems );
01972                   if( pWorldItems == NULL )
01973                   {
01974                         //Error Allocating memory for the temp item array
01975                         return( FALSE );
01976                   }
01977 
01978                   //Clear the memory
01979                   memset( pWorldItems, 0, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumberOfItems );
01980 
01981                   //Load the World Items from the file
01982                   if( !LoadWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, pWorldItems ) )
01983                         return( FALSE );
01984 
01985                   uiNumberOfActive = 0;
01986                   for( cnt=0; cnt<uiNumberOfItems; cnt++ )
01987                   {
01988                         if( pWorldItems[cnt].fExists )
01989                               uiNumberOfActive++;
01990                   }
01991                   MemFree( pWorldItems );
01992             }
01993             *pNumberOfData = uiNumberOfActive;
01994       }
01995       else
01996             *pNumberOfData = 0;
01997 
01998       return( TRUE );
01999 }
02000 
02001 
02002 BOOLEAN DoesTempFileExistsForMap( UINT32 uiType, INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
02003 {
02004       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *TempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
02005 
02006       if( bMapZ == 0 )
02007       {
02008             return( (SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags & uiType) ? 1 : 0 );
02009       }
02010       else
02011       {
02012             while( TempNode )
02013             {
02014                   if( TempNode->ubSectorX == sMapX && TempNode->ubSectorY == sMapY && TempNode->ubSectorZ == bMapZ )
02015                   {
02016                         return( (TempNode->uiFlags & uiType ) ? 1 : 0 );
02017                   }
02018                   TempNode = TempNode->next;
02019             }
02020       }
02021 
02022       return( FALSE );
02023 }

02025 
02026 INT16 GetSoldierIDFromAnyMercID(UINT8 ubMercID)
02027 {
02028       UINT16 cnt;
02029       UINT8       ubLastTeamID;
02030       SOLDIERTYPE       *pTeamSoldier;
02031 
02032       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
02033 
02034       ubLastTeamID = TOTAL_SOLDIERS;
02035 
02036   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
02037   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= ubLastTeamID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
02038       {     
02039             if( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
02040             {
02041                   if ( pTeamSoldier->ubProfile == ubMercID )
02042                   {
02043                         return( cnt );
02044                   }
02045             }
02046       }
02047 
02048       return( -1 );
02049 }

02053 
02054 //Initializes the NPC temp array 
02055 BOOLEAN InitTempNpcQuoteInfoForNPCFromTempFile()
02056 {
02057       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
02058       UINT8 ubCnt;
02059       UINT8 ubOne=1;
02060       UINT8 ubZero=0;
02061       TempNPCQuoteInfoSave TempNpcQuote[ NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS ];
02062       UINT32      uiSizeOfTempArray = sizeof( TempNPCQuoteInfoSave ) * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS;
02063       UINT16      usCnt1;
02064       HWFILE      hFile;
02065 
02066 
02067       //Open the temp npc file
02068       hFile = FileOpen( NPC_TEMP_QUOTE_FILE, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
02069       if( hFile == 0 )
02070       {
02071             //Error opening temp npc quote info
02072             return( FALSE );
02073       }
02074 
02075 
02076       //loop through all the npc accounts and write the temp array to disk
02077       for( usCnt1=0; usCnt1< ( GASTON-FIRST_RPC ); usCnt1++)
02078       {
02079 
02080             memset( TempNpcQuote, 0, uiSizeOfTempArray );
02081 
02082             //Loop through and build the temp array to save
02083             for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubCnt++ )
02084             {
02085                   if( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ usCnt1 ] )
02086                   {
02087                         TempNpcQuote[ ubCnt ].usFlags                   = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ usCnt1 ][ ubCnt ].fFlags;
02088                         TempNpcQuote[ ubCnt ].sRequiredItem = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ usCnt1 ][ ubCnt ].sRequiredItem;
02089                         TempNpcQuote[ ubCnt ].usGoToGridno  = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ usCnt1 ][ ubCnt ].usGoToGridno;
02090                   }
02091             }
02092 
02093             //Save the array to a temp file
02094             FileWrite( hFile, TempNpcQuote, uiSizeOfTempArray, &uiNumBytesWritten );
02095             if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSizeOfTempArray )
02096             {
02097                   FileClose( hFile );     
02098                   return( FALSE );
02099             }
02100       }
02101 
02102       FileClose( hFile );
02103       return( TRUE );
02104 }
02105 
02106 
02107 
02108 BOOLEAN SaveTempNpcQuoteInfoForNPCToTempFile( UINT8 ubNpcId )
02109 {
02110       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
02111       UINT8 ubCnt;
02112       UINT8 ubOne=1;
02113       UINT8 ubZero=0;
02114       TempNPCQuoteInfoSave TempNpcQuote[ NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS ];
02115       UINT32      uiSizeOfTempArray = sizeof( TempNPCQuoteInfoSave ) * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS;
02116       UINT32      uiSpotInFile = ubNpcId - FIRST_RPC;
02117       HWFILE      hFile=0;
02118 
02119       //if there are records to save
02120       if( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNpcId ] )
02121       {
02122 
02123             hFile = FileOpen( NPC_TEMP_QUOTE_FILE, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
02124             if( hFile == 0 )
02125             {
02126                   //Error opening temp npc quote info
02127                   return( FALSE );
02128             }
02129 
02130             memset( TempNpcQuote, 0, uiSizeOfTempArray );
02131 
02132             //Loop through and build the temp array to save
02133             for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubCnt++ )
02134             {
02135                   TempNpcQuote[ ubCnt ].usFlags                   = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNpcId ][ ubCnt ].fFlags;
02136                   TempNpcQuote[ ubCnt ].sRequiredItem = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNpcId ][ ubCnt ].sRequiredItem;
02137                   TempNpcQuote[ ubCnt ].usGoToGridno  = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNpcId ][ ubCnt ].usGoToGridno;
02138             }
02139 
02140             //Seek to the correct spot in the file
02141             FileSeek( hFile, uiSpotInFile * uiSizeOfTempArray, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START );
02142 
02143             //Save the array to a temp file
02144             FileWrite( hFile, TempNpcQuote, uiSizeOfTempArray, &uiNumBytesWritten );
02145             if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSizeOfTempArray )
02146             {
02147                   FileClose( hFile );     
02148                   return( FALSE );
02149             }
02150 
02151             //Set the fact that the merc has the temp npc quote data
02152             gMercProfiles[ ubNpcId ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_TEMP_NPC_QUOTE_DATA_EXISTS;
02153 
02154             FileClose( hFile );     
02155       }
02156 
02157 
02158       return( TRUE );
02159 }
02160

02162 
02163 
02164 BOOLEAN LoadTempNpcQuoteInfoForNPCFromTempFile( UINT8 ubNpcId )
02165 {
02166       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
02167       UINT8       ubCnt;
02168       UINT8       ubOne=1;
02169       UINT8       ubZero=0;
02170       TempNPCQuoteInfoSave TempNpcQuote[ NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS ];
02171       UINT32      uiSizeOfTempArray = sizeof( TempNPCQuoteInfoSave ) * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS;
02172       UINT32      uiSpotInFile = ubNpcId - FIRST_RPC;
02173       HWFILE      hFile;
02174 
02175 
02176       //Init the array
02177       memset( TempNpcQuote, 0, uiSizeOfTempArray );
02178 
02179 
02180       //If there isnt already memory allocated, allocate memory to hold the array
02181       if( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNpcId ] == NULL )
02182       {
02183             gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNpcId ] = (NPCQuoteInfo *) MemAlloc( sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo ) * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS );
02184             if( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNpcId ] == NULL )
02185                   return( FALSE );
02186       }
02187 
02188 
02189       hFile = FileOpen( NPC_TEMP_QUOTE_FILE, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
02190       if( hFile == 0 )
02191       {
02192             //Error opening temp npc quote info
02193             return( FALSE );
02194       }
02195 
02196       //Seek to the correct spot in the file
02197       FileSeek( hFile, uiSpotInFile * uiSizeOfTempArray, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START );
02198 
02199       //Save the array to a temp file
02200       FileRead( hFile, TempNpcQuote, uiSizeOfTempArray, &uiNumBytesRead );
02201       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiSizeOfTempArray )
02202       {
02203             FileClose( hFile );     
02204             return( FALSE );
02205       }
02206 
02207 
02208 
02209       //Loop through and build the temp array to save
02210       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubCnt++ )
02211       {
02212             gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNpcId ][ ubCnt ].fFlags                          = TempNpcQuote[ ubCnt ].usFlags;
02213             gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNpcId ][ ubCnt ].sRequiredItem       = TempNpcQuote[ ubCnt ].sRequiredItem;
02214             gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNpcId ][ ubCnt ].usGoToGridno        = TempNpcQuote[ ubCnt ].usGoToGridno;
02215       }
02216 
02217       FileClose( hFile );     
02218 
02219       return( TRUE );
02220 }

02228 void ChangeNpcToDifferentSector( UINT8 ubNpcId, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
02229 {
02230       if (gMercProfiles[ ubNpcId ].ubMiscFlags2 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_LEFT_COUNTRY)
02231       {
02232             // override location, this person is OUTTA here
02233             sSectorX = 0;
02234             sSectorY = 0;
02235             bSectorZ = 0;
02236       }
02237       // Carmen no longer traverses out, he is temporarily removed instead
02238 
02239       gMercProfiles[ ubNpcId ].sSectorX = sSectorX;
02240       gMercProfiles[ ubNpcId ].sSectorY = sSectorY;
02241       gMercProfiles[ ubNpcId ].bSectorZ = bSectorZ;
02242 
02243       gMercProfiles[ ubNpcId ].fUseProfileInsertionInfo = FALSE;
02244 
02245       /*
02246       if (!gMercProfiles[ ubNpcId ].ubMiscFlags2 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_DONT_ADD_TO_SECTOR)
02247       {
02248             gMercProfiles[ ubNpcId ].fUseProfileInsertionInfo = PROFILE_DONT_USE_GRIDNO;
02249       }
02250       */
02251 }
