02256 
02257 BOOLEAN AddRottingCorpseToUnloadedSectorsRottingCorpseFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION *pRottingCorpseDef )
02258 {
02259       HWFILE      hFile;
02260       UINT32      uiNumberOfCorpses;
02261 //    CHAR8       zTempName[ 128 ];
02262       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
02263       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
02264       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
02265 
02266 /*
02267       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
02268       GetMapFileName( sMapX,sMapY, bMapZ, zTempName, FALSE );
02269 
02270       //add the 'r' for 'Rotting Corpses' to the front of the map name
02271       sprintf( zMapName, "%s\\r_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02272 */
02273       GetMapTempFileName( SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
02274 
02275       //CHECK TO SEE if the file exist 
02276       if( FileExists( zMapName ) )
02277       {
02278             //Open the file for reading
02279             hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_READWRITE | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
02280             if( hFile == 0 )
02281             {
02282                   //Error opening map modification file,
02283                   return( FALSE );
02284             }
02285 
02286             // Load the number of Rotting corpses
02287             FileRead( hFile, &uiNumberOfCorpses, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02288             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
02289             {
02290                   //Error Writing size of array to disk
02291                   FileClose( hFile );
02292                   return( FALSE );
02293             }
02294       }
02295       else
02296       {
02297             //the file doesnt exists, create a new one
02298             hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
02299             if( hFile == 0 )
02300             {
02301                   //Error opening map modification file
02302                   return( FALSE );
02303             }
02304             uiNumberOfCorpses = 0;
02305       }
02306 
02307       //Start at the begining of the file
02308       FileSeek( hFile, 0, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START );
02309 
02310       //Add on to the number and save it back to disk
02311       uiNumberOfCorpses++;
02312 
02313       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumberOfCorpses, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02314       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
02315       {
02316             //Error Writing size of array to disk
02317             FileClose( hFile );
02318             return( FALSE );
02319       }
02320 
02321 
02322       //Go to the end of the file
02323       FileSeek( hFile, 0, FILE_SEEK_FROM_END );
02324 
02325       //Append the new rotting corpse def to the end of the file
02326       FileWrite( hFile, pRottingCorpseDef, sizeof( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02327       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION ) )
02328       {
02329             //Error Writing size of array to disk
02330             FileClose( hFile );
02331             return( FALSE );
02332       }
02333 
02334       
02335       FileClose( hFile );
02336       SetSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
02337       return( TRUE );
02338 }
02339 
02340 
02341 
02342 BOOLEAN SetUnderGroundSectorFlag( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 ubSectorZ, UINT32 uiFlagToSet )
02343 {
02344       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pTempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
02345 
02346       pTempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
02347 
02348       //loop through and look for the right underground sector
02349       while( pTempNode )
02350       {
02351             if( ( pTempNode->ubSectorX == (UINT8)sSectorX ) && 
02352                         ( pTempNode->ubSectorY == (UINT8)sSectorY ) && 
02353                         ( pTempNode->ubSectorZ == ubSectorZ ) )
02354             {
02355                   //set the flag indicating that ther is a temp item file exists for the sector
02356                   pTempNode->uiFlags |= uiFlagToSet;
02357 
02358                   return( TRUE );
02359             }
02360             pTempNode = pTempNode->next;
02361       }
02362 
02363       return( FALSE );
02364 }
02365 
02366 BOOLEAN ReSetUnderGroundSectorFlag( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 ubSectorZ, UINT32 uiFlagToSet )
02367 {
02368       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pTempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
02369 
02370       pTempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
02371 
02372       //loop through and look for the right underground sector
02373       while( pTempNode )
02374       {
02375             if( ( pTempNode->ubSectorX == (UINT8)sSectorX ) && 
02376                         ( pTempNode->ubSectorY == (UINT8)sSectorY ) && 
02377                         ( pTempNode->ubSectorZ == ubSectorZ ) )
02378             {
02379                   //set the flag indicating that ther is a temp item file exists for the sector
02380                   pTempNode->uiFlags &= ~( uiFlagToSet );
02381 
02382                   return( TRUE );
02383             }
02384             pTempNode = pTempNode->next;
02385       }
02386 
02387       return( FALSE );
02388 }
02389 
02390 BOOLEAN GetUnderGroundSectorFlagStatus( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 ubSectorZ, UINT32 uiFlagToCheck )
02391 {
02392       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pTempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
02393 
02394       pTempNode = gpUndergroundSectorInfoHead;
02395 
02396       //loop through and look for the right underground sector
02397       while( pTempNode )
02398       {
02399             if( ( pTempNode->ubSectorX == (UINT8)sSectorX ) && 
02400                         ( pTempNode->ubSectorY == (UINT8)sSectorY ) && 
02401                         ( pTempNode->ubSectorZ == ubSectorZ ) )
02402             {
02403                   //set the flag indicating that ther is a temp item file exists for the sector
02404                   if( pTempNode->uiFlags & uiFlagToCheck )
02405                         return( TRUE );
02406                   else
02407                         return( FALSE );
02408             }
02409             pTempNode = pTempNode->next;
02410       }
02411       return( FALSE );
02412 }
02413 
02414 
02415 BOOLEAN SetSectorFlag( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT8 bMapZ, UINT32 uiFlagToSet )
02416 {
02417       if( uiFlagToSet == SF_ALREADY_VISITED )
02418       {
02419             // do certain things when particular sectors are visited
02420             if ( ( sMapX == TIXA_SECTOR_X ) && ( sMapY == TIXA_SECTOR_Y ) )
02421             {
02422                   // Tixa prison (not seen until Tixa visited)
02423                   SectorInfo[ SEC_J9 ].uiFacilitiesFlags |= SFCF_PRISON;
02424             }
02425 
02426             if ( ( sMapX == GUN_RANGE_X ) && ( sMapY == GUN_RANGE_Y ) && ( bMapZ == GUN_RANGE_Z ) )
02427             {
02428                   // Alma shooting range (not seen until sector visited)
02429                   SectorInfo[ SEC_H13 ].uiFacilitiesFlags |= SFCF_GUN_RANGE;
02430                   SectorInfo[ SEC_H14 ].uiFacilitiesFlags |= SFCF_GUN_RANGE;
02431                   SectorInfo[ SEC_I13 ].uiFacilitiesFlags |= SFCF_GUN_RANGE;
02432                   SectorInfo[ SEC_I14 ].uiFacilitiesFlags |= SFCF_GUN_RANGE;
02433             }
02434 
02435             if ( !GetSectorFlagStatus( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_ALREADY_VISITED ) )
02436             {
02437                   // increment daily counter of sectors visited
02438                   gStrategicStatus.ubNumNewSectorsVisitedToday++;
02439                   if ( gStrategicStatus.ubNumNewSectorsVisitedToday == NEW_SECTORS_EQUAL_TO_ACTIVITY )
02440                   {
02441                         // visited enough to count as an active day
02442                         UpdateLastDayOfPlayerActivity( (UINT16) GetWorldDay() );
02443                   }
02444             }
02445       }
02446 
02447       if( bMapZ == 0 )
02448             SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags |= uiFlagToSet;
02449       else
02450             SetUnderGroundSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, uiFlagToSet );
02451 
02452       return( TRUE );
02453 }
02454 
02455 BOOLEAN ReSetSectorFlag( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT8 bMapZ, UINT32 uiFlagToSet )
02456 {
02457       if( bMapZ == 0 )
02458             SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX,sMapY) ].uiFlags &= ~( uiFlagToSet );
02459       else
02460             ReSetUnderGroundSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, uiFlagToSet );
02461 
02462       return( TRUE );
02463 }
02464 
02465 BOOLEAN GetSectorFlagStatus( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT8 bMapZ, UINT32 uiFlagToSet )
02466 {
02467       if( bMapZ == 0 )
02468             return( (SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].uiFlags & uiFlagToSet ) ? 1 : 0 );
02469       else
02470             return( (GetUnderGroundSectorFlagStatus( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, uiFlagToSet ) ) ? 1 : 0  );
02471 }
02472 
02473 
02474 
02475 BOOLEAN AddDeadSoldierToUnLoadedSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT8 bMapZ, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16  sGridNo, UINT32 uiFlags )
02476 {
02477       UINT32                  uiNumberOfItems;
02478       WORLDITEM         *pWorldItems=NULL;
02479       UINT                    i;
02480       UINT8                   bCount=0;
02481       UINT16                  uiFlagsForWorldItems=0;
02482       UINT16                  usFlagsForRottingCorpse=0;
02483       ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION           Corpse;
02484       INT16                   sXPos, sYPos;
02485       UINT32                  uiDeathAnim;
02486       UINT32                  uiPossibleDeathAnims[] = {    GENERIC_HIT_DEATH,
02487                                                                                                                               FALLBACK_HIT_DEATH,
02488                                                                                                                               PRONE_HIT_DEATH,
02489                                                                                                                               FLYBACK_HIT_DEATH };
02490       const UINT8                   ubNumOfDeaths=4;
02491 
02492 
02493 
02494       //setup the flags for the items and the rotting corpses
02495       if( uiFlags & ADD_DEAD_SOLDIER_USE_GRIDNO )
02496       {
02497             uiFlagsForWorldItems          = 0;
02498             usFlagsForRottingCorpse = 0;
02499       }
02500 
02501       else if( uiFlags & ADD_DEAD_SOLDIER_TO_SWEETSPOT )
02502       {     
02503             uiFlagsForWorldItems          |= WOLRD_ITEM_FIND_SWEETSPOT_FROM_GRIDNO | WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE;
02504             usFlagsForRottingCorpse |= ROTTING_CORPSE_FIND_SWEETSPOT_FROM_GRIDNO;
02505       }
02506       else
02507             AssertMsg( 0, "ERROR!!  Flag not is Switch statement");
02508 
02509 
02510 
02511       //
02512       //Create an array of objects from the mercs inventory
02513       //
02514 
02515       //go through and and find out how many items there are
02516       uiNumberOfItems = 0;
02517       for ( i = 0; i < NUM_INV_SLOTS; i++ )
02518       { 
02519             if( pSoldier->inv[ i ].usItem != 0 )
02520             {
02521                   // if not a player soldier
02522                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
02523                   {
02524                         // this percent of the time, they don't drop stuff they would've dropped in tactical...
02525                         if ( Random( 100 ) < 75 )
02526                         {
02527                               // mark it undroppable...
02528                               pSoldier->inv[ i ].fFlags |= OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE;
02529                         }
02530                   }
02531 
02532                   //if the item can be dropped
02533                   if( !( pSoldier->inv[ i ].fFlags & OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE ) || pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02534                   {
02535 
02536         uiNumberOfItems++;
02537                   }
02538             }
02539       }
02540 
02541   // If a robot, don't drop anything...
02542   if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
02543   {
02544     uiNumberOfItems = 0;
02545   }
02546 
02547       //if there are items to add
02548       if( uiNumberOfItems )
02549       {
02550             //allocate memory for the world item array
02551             pWorldItems = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumberOfItems );
02552             if( pWorldItems == NULL )
02553             {
02554                   //Error Allocating memory for the temp item array
02555                   return( FALSE );
02556             }
02557             //Clear the memory
02558             memset( pWorldItems, 0, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumberOfItems );
02559 
02560             //loop through all the soldiers items and add them to the world item array
02561             bCount = 0;
02562             for ( i = 0; i < NUM_INV_SLOTS; i++ )
02563             { 
02564                   if( pSoldier->inv[ i ].usItem != 0 )
02565                   {
02566                         //if the item can be dropped
02567                         if( !(pSoldier->inv[ i ].fFlags & OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE) || pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02568                         {
02569                               ReduceAmmoDroppedByNonPlayerSoldiers( pSoldier, i );
02570 
02571                               pWorldItems[ bCount ].fExists = TRUE;
02572                               pWorldItems[ bCount ].sGridNo = sGridNo;
02573                               pWorldItems[ bCount ].ubLevel = (UINT8)pSoldier->bLevel;
02574                               pWorldItems[ bCount ].usFlags = uiFlagsForWorldItems;
02575                               pWorldItems[ bCount ].bVisible = TRUE;
02576                               pWorldItems[ bCount ].bRenderZHeightAboveLevel = 0;
02577 
02578                               if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[i].usItem].damageable ) // Madd: drop crappier items on higher difficulty levels
02579                               {
02580                                     pSoldier->inv[i].bStatus[0] -= (gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel - 1) * Random(20);
02581                                     pSoldier->inv[i].bStatus[0] = max(pSoldier->inv[i].bStatus[0],1); // never below 1%
02582                               }
02583                               memcpy( &(pWorldItems[ bCount ].o), &pSoldier->inv[i], sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02584                               bCount++;
02585                         }
02586                   }
02587             }
02588 
02589             //Add the soldiers items to an unloaded sector
02590             AddWorldItemsToUnLoadedSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, sGridNo, uiNumberOfItems, pWorldItems, FALSE );
02591       }
02592 
02593   DropKeysInKeyRing( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, 1, FALSE, 0, TRUE );
02594 
02595       //
02596       //Convert the soldier into a rottng corpse 
02597       //
02598 
02599       memset( &Corpse, 0, sizeof( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION ) );
02600 
02601       // Setup some values!
02602       Corpse.ubBodyType                                     = pSoldier->ubBodyType;
02603       Corpse.sGridNo                                              = sGridNo;
02604 
02605       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
02606 
02607       Corpse.dXPos                                                      = (FLOAT)( CenterX( sXPos ) );
02608       Corpse.dYPos                                                      = (FLOAT)( CenterY( sYPos ) );
02609       Corpse.sHeightAdjustment                  = pSoldier->sHeightAdjustment;
02610       Corpse.bVisible                                             =     TRUE;
02611 
02612       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.HeadPal,       pSoldier->HeadPal );
02613       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.VestPal,       pSoldier->VestPal );
02614       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.SkinPal,       pSoldier->SkinPal );
02615       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.PantsPal,   pSoldier->PantsPal );
02616 
02617       Corpse.bDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
02618 
02619       // Set time of death
02620       Corpse.uiTimeOfDeath = GetWorldTotalMin( );
02621 
02622       //if the dead body shot be the result of a Jfk headshot, set it
02623       if( uiFlags & ADD_DEAD_SOLDIER__USE_JFK_HEADSHOT_CORPSE )
02624             uiDeathAnim = JFK_HITDEATH;
02625 
02626       //else chose a random death sequence
02627       else
02628             uiDeathAnim = uiPossibleDeathAnims[ Random( 4 ) ];
02629 
02630 
02631       // Set type
02632       Corpse.ubType     = (UINT8)gubAnimSurfaceCorpseID[ pSoldier->ubBodyType][ uiDeathAnim ];
02633 
02634       Corpse.usFlags |= usFlagsForRottingCorpse;
02635 
02636       //Add the rotting corpse info to the sectors unloaded rotting corpse file
02637       AddRottingCorpseToUnloadedSectorsRottingCorpseFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, &Corpse);
02638 
02639       //FRee the memory used for the pWorldItem array
02640       MemFree( pWorldItems );
02641       pWorldItems = NULL;
02642 
02643       return( TRUE );
02644 }

02656 void TempFileLoadErrorMessageReturnCallback( UINT8 ubRetVal )

02659 }

02661 //if you call this function, make sure you return TRUE (if applicable) to make the game
02662 //think it succeeded the load.  This sets up the dialog for the game exit, after the hacker
02663 //message appears.
02664 void InitExitGameDialogBecauseFileHackDetected()
02665 {
02666       SGPRect CenteringRect= {0, 0, 639, 479 };
02667 
02668       // do message box and return
02669       giErrorMessageBox = DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, pAntiHackerString[ ANTIHACKERSTR_EXITGAME ], 
02670                                                                   GAME_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, TempFileLoadErrorMessageReturnCallback, &CenteringRect );
02671 }

02674 
02675 UINT32 MercChecksum( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
02676 {
02677       UINT32      uiChecksum = 1;
02678       UINT32      uiLoop;
02679 
02680       uiChecksum += (pSoldier->bLife + 1);
02681       uiChecksum *= (pSoldier->bLifeMax + 1);
02682       uiChecksum += (pSoldier->bAgility + 1);
02683       uiChecksum *= (pSoldier->bDexterity + 1);
02684       uiChecksum += (pSoldier->bStrength + 1);
02685       uiChecksum *= (pSoldier->bMarksmanship + 1);
02686       uiChecksum += (pSoldier->bMedical + 1);
02687       uiChecksum *= (pSoldier->bMechanical + 1);
02688       uiChecksum += (pSoldier->bExplosive + 1);
02689 
02690       // put in some multipliers too!
02691       uiChecksum *= (pSoldier->bExpLevel + 1);
02692       uiChecksum += (pSoldier->ubProfile + 1);
02693 
02694       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; uiLoop++ )
02695       {
02696             uiChecksum += pSoldier->inv[ uiLoop ].usItem;
02697             uiChecksum += pSoldier->inv[ uiLoop ].ubNumberOfObjects;
02698       }
02699 
02700       return( uiChecksum );
02701 }
02702 
02703 UINT32 ProfileChecksum( MERCPROFILESTRUCT * pProfile )
02704 {
02705       UINT32      uiChecksum = 1;
02706       UINT32      uiLoop;
02707 
02708       uiChecksum += (pProfile->bLife + 1);
02709       uiChecksum *= (pProfile->bLifeMax + 1);
02710       uiChecksum += (pProfile->bAgility + 1);
02711       uiChecksum *= (pProfile->bDexterity + 1);
02712       uiChecksum += (pProfile->bStrength + 1);
02713       uiChecksum *= (pProfile->bMarksmanship + 1);
02714       uiChecksum += (pProfile->bMedical + 1);
02715       uiChecksum *= (pProfile->bMechanical + 1);
02716       uiChecksum += (pProfile->bExplosive + 1);
02717 
02718       // put in some multipliers too!
02719       uiChecksum *= (pProfile->bExpLevel + 1);
02720 
02721       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUM_INV_SLOTS; uiLoop++ )
02722       {
02723             uiChecksum += pProfile->inv[ uiLoop ];
02724             uiChecksum += pProfile->bInvNumber[ uiLoop ];
02725       }
02726 
02727       return( uiChecksum );
02728 }
02729 
02730 //UINT8 gubEncryptionArray4[ BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 3 ][ NEW_ROTATION_ARRAY_SIZE ] =
02731 UINT8 * GetRotationArray( void )
02732 {
02733       // based on guiJA2EncryptionSet
02734       if ( guiJA2EncryptionSet < BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 6 ) 
02735       {
02736             if ( guiJA2EncryptionSet < BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 3 )
02737             {
02738                   return( gubEncryptionArray1[ guiJA2EncryptionSet % (BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 3) ]);
02739             }
02740             else
02741             {
02742                   return( gubEncryptionArray2[ guiJA2EncryptionSet % (BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 3) ]);
02743             }
02744       }
02745       else
02746       {
02747             if ( guiJA2EncryptionSet < BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 9 )
02748             {
02749                   return( gubEncryptionArray3[ guiJA2EncryptionSet % (BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 3) ]);
02750             }
02751             else
02752             {
02753                   return( gubEncryptionArray4[ guiJA2EncryptionSet % (BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 3) ]);
02754             }
02755       }
02756 }
02757 
02758 BOOLEAN NewJA2EncryptedFileRead( HWFILE hFile, PTR pDest, UINT32 uiBytesToRead, UINT32 *puiBytesRead )
02759 {
02760       UINT32      uiLoop;
02761       UINT8       ubArrayIndex = 0;
02762       UINT8       ubLastByte = 0;
02763       UINT8       ubLastByteForNextLoop;
02764       BOOLEAN     fRet;
02765       UINT8 *     pMemBlock;
02766       UINT8 * pubRotationArray;
02767 
02768       pubRotationArray = GetRotationArray();
02769 
02770       fRet = FileRead( hFile, pDest, uiBytesToRead, puiBytesRead );
02771       if ( fRet )
02772       {
02773             pMemBlock = (UINT8 *)pDest;
02774             for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < *puiBytesRead; uiLoop++ )
02775             {
02776                   ubLastByteForNextLoop = pMemBlock[ uiLoop ];
02777                   pMemBlock[ uiLoop ] -= (ubLastByte + pubRotationArray[ ubArrayIndex ]);
02778                   ubArrayIndex++;
02779                   if ( ubArrayIndex >= NEW_ROTATION_ARRAY_SIZE )
02780                   {
02781                         ubArrayIndex = 0;
02782                   }
02783                   ubLastByte = ubLastByteForNextLoop;
02784             }
02785       }
02786 
02787       return( fRet );
02788 }
02789 
02790 
02791 BOOLEAN NewJA2EncryptedFileWrite( HWFILE hFile, PTR pDest, UINT32 uiBytesToWrite, UINT32 *puiBytesWritten )
02792 {
02793       UINT32      uiLoop;
02794       UINT8       ubArrayIndex = 0;
02795       UINT8       ubLastByte = 0;//, ubTemp;
02796       UINT8 * pMemBlock;
02797       BOOLEAN     fRet;
02798       UINT8 * pubRotationArray;
02799 
02800       pMemBlock = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( uiBytesToWrite );
02801       
02802       if ( !pMemBlock )
02803       {
02804             return( FALSE );
02805       }
02806       memset( pMemBlock, 0, uiBytesToWrite );
02807 
02808       pubRotationArray = GetRotationArray();
02809 
02810       memcpy( pMemBlock, pDest, uiBytesToWrite ); 
02811       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < uiBytesToWrite; uiLoop++ )
02812       {
02813             pMemBlock[ uiLoop ] += ubLastByte + pubRotationArray[ ubArrayIndex ];
02814             ubArrayIndex++;
02815             if ( ubArrayIndex >= NEW_ROTATION_ARRAY_SIZE )
02816             {
02817                   ubArrayIndex = 0;
02818             }
02819             ubLastByte = pMemBlock[ uiLoop ];
02820       }
02821 
02822       fRet = FileWrite( hFile, pMemBlock, uiBytesToWrite, puiBytesWritten );
02823 
02824       MemFree( pMemBlock );
02825 
02826       return( fRet );
02827 
02828 }
02829 
02830 
02831 #define ROTATION_ARRAY_SIZE 46
02832 UINT8 ubRotationArray[46] = { 132, 235, 125, 99, 15, 220, 140, 89, 205, 132, 254, 144, 217, 78, 156, 58, 215, 76, 163, 187, 55, 49, 65, 48, 156, 140, 201, 68, 184, 13, 45, 69, 102, 185, 122, 225, 23, 250, 160, 220, 114, 240, 64, 175, 057, 233 };
02833 
02834 BOOLEAN JA2EncryptedFileRead( HWFILE hFile, PTR pDest, UINT32 uiBytesToRead, UINT32 *puiBytesRead )
02835 {
02836       UINT32      uiLoop;
02837       UINT8       ubArrayIndex = 0;
02838       //UINT8           ubLastNonBlank = 0;
02839       UINT8       ubLastByte = 0;
02840       UINT8       ubLastByteForNextLoop;
02841       BOOLEAN     fRet;
02842       UINT8 *     pMemBlock;
02843 
02844       fRet = FileRead( hFile, pDest, uiBytesToRead, puiBytesRead );
02845       if ( fRet )
02846       {
02847             pMemBlock = (UINT8 *)pDest;
02848             for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < *puiBytesRead; uiLoop++ )
02849             {
02850                   ubLastByteForNextLoop = pMemBlock[ uiLoop ];
02851                   pMemBlock[ uiLoop ] -= (ubLastByte + ubRotationArray[ ubArrayIndex ]);
02852                   ubArrayIndex++;
02853                   if ( ubArrayIndex >= ROTATION_ARRAY_SIZE )
02854                   {
02855                         ubArrayIndex = 0;
02856                   }
02857                   ubLastByte = ubLastByteForNextLoop;
02858             }
02859       }
02860 
02861       return( fRet );
02862 }
02863

02865 BOOLEAN JA2EncryptedFileWrite( HWFILE hFile, PTR pDest, UINT32 uiBytesToWrite, UINT32 *puiBytesWritten )
02866 {
02867       UINT32      uiLoop;
02868       UINT8       ubArrayIndex = 0;
02869       //UINT8           ubLastNonBlank = 0;
02870       UINT8       ubLastByte = 0;//, ubTemp;
02871       UINT8 * pMemBlock;
02872       BOOLEAN     fRet;
02873 
02874       pMemBlock = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( uiBytesToWrite );
02875       
02876       if ( !pMemBlock )
02877       {
02878             return( FALSE );
02879       }
02880       memset( pMemBlock, 0, uiBytesToWrite );
02881 
02882 
02883       memcpy( pMemBlock, pDest, uiBytesToWrite ); 
02884       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < uiBytesToWrite; uiLoop++ )
02885       {
02886             //ubTemp = pMemBlock[ uiLoop ];
02887             pMemBlock[ uiLoop ] += ubLastByte + ubRotationArray[ ubArrayIndex ];
02888             ubArrayIndex++;
02889             if ( ubArrayIndex >= ROTATION_ARRAY_SIZE )
02890             {
02891                   ubArrayIndex = 0;
02892             }
02893             ubLastByte = pMemBlock[ uiLoop ];
02894             /*
02895             if ( pMemBlock[ uiLoop ] )
02896             {
02897                   // store last non blank
02898                   ubLastNonBlank = pMemBlock[ uiLoop ];
02899 
02900                   pMemBlock[ uiLoop ] += ubRotationArray[ ubArrayIndex ];
02901                   ubArrayIndex++;
02902                   if ( ubArrayIndex >= ROTATION_ARRAY_SIZE )
02903                   {
02904                         ubArrayIndex = 0;
02905                   }
02906             }
02907             else // zero byte
02908             {
02909                   pMemBlock[ uiLoop ] = ubLastNonBlank + ubRotationArray[ ubArrayIndex ];
02910                   ubArrayIndex++;
02911                   if ( ubArrayIndex >= ROTATION_ARRAY_SIZE )
02912                   {
02913                         ubArrayIndex = 0;
02914                   }
02915             }
02916             */
02917       }
02918 
02919       fRet = FileWrite( hFile, pMemBlock, uiBytesToWrite, puiBytesWritten );
02920 
02921       MemFree( pMemBlock );
02922 
02923       return( fRet );
02924 
02925 }
02926 
02927 void GetMapTempFileName( UINT32 uiType, STR pMapName, INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
02928 {
02929       CHAR  zTempName[512];
02930 
02931       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
02932       GetMapFileName( sMapX,sMapY, bMapZ, zTempName, FALSE, FALSE );
02933 
02934       switch( uiType )
02935       {
02936             case SF_ITEM_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS:
02937                   sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\i_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02938                   break;
02939 
02940             case SF_ROTTING_CORPSE_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS:
02941                   sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\r_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02942                   break;
02943 
02944             case SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS:
02945                   sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\m_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02946                   break;
02947 
02948             case SF_DOOR_TABLE_TEMP_FILES_EXISTS:
02949                   sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\d_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02950                   break;
02951 
02952             case SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS:
02953                   sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\v_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02954                   break;
02955 
02956             case SF_DOOR_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS:
02957                   sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\ds_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02958                   break;
02959 
02960             case SF_ENEMY_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS:
02961                   sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\e_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02962                   break;
02963 
02964             case SF_CIV_PRESERVED_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS:
02965                   // NB save game version 0 is "saving game"
02966                   if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME) && guiSaveGameVersion != 0 && guiSaveGameVersion < 78 )
02967                   {
02968                         sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\c_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02969                   }
02970                   else
02971                   {
02972                         sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\cc_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02973                   }
02974                   break;
02975 
02976             case SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS:
02977                   sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\sm_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02978                   break;
02979 
02980             case SF_LIGHTING_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS:
02981                   sprintf( (char *)pMapName, "%s\\l_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
02982                   break;
02983 
02984             default:
02985                   Assert( 0 );
02986                   break;
02987       }
02988 }
02989 
02990 UINT32      GetNumberOfVisibleWorldItemsFromSectorStructureForSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
02991 {
02992       UINT32 uiNumberOfItems=0;
02993       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector=NULL;
02994 
02995       //if the sector is above ground
02996       if( bMapZ == 0 )
02997       {
02998             uiNumberOfItems = SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].uiNumberOfWorldItemsInTempFileThatCanBeSeenByPlayer;
02999       }
03000       else
03001       {
03002             //find the underground sector
03003             pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
03004             if( pSector != NULL )
03005             {
03006                   //get the number of items
03007                   uiNumberOfItems = pSector->uiNumberOfWorldItemsInTempFileThatCanBeSeenByPlayer;
03008             }
03009       }
03010 
03011       //if there is a sector loaded
03012       if( gfWorldLoaded )
03013       {
03014             //and it is the sector we are interested in
03015             if( sMapX == gWorldSectorX && sMapY == gWorldSectorY && bMapZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
03016             {
03017                   //since items might have been added, update
03018                   uiNumberOfItems = UpdateLoadedSectorsItemInventory( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, uiNumberOfItems );
03019             }
03020       }
03021 
03022 
03023       return( uiNumberOfItems );
03024 }
03025 
03026 void  SetNumberOfVisibleWorldItemsInSectorStructureForSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, UINT32 uiNumberOfItems )
03027 {
03028       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector=NULL;
03029 
03030       //if the sector is above ground
03031       if( bMapZ == 0 )
03032       {
03033             SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].uiNumberOfWorldItemsInTempFileThatCanBeSeenByPlayer = uiNumberOfItems;
03034       }
03035       else
03036       {
03037             //find the underground sector
03038             pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
03039             if( pSector != NULL )
03040             {
03041                   //get the number of items
03042                   pSector->uiNumberOfWorldItemsInTempFileThatCanBeSeenByPlayer = uiNumberOfItems ;
03043             }
03044       }
03045 }
03046 
03047 
03048 void SynchronizeItemTempFileVisbleItemsToSectorInfoVisbleItems( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, BOOLEAN fLoadingGame )
03049 {
03050       UINT32 uiTotalNumberOfItems = 0, uiTotalNumberOfRealItems = 0;
03051       WORLDITEM * pTotalSectorList = NULL;
03052       UINT32 uiItemCount = 0;
03053       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03054       BOOLEAN     fReturn;
03055 
03056 
03057       // get total number, visable and invisible
03058       fReturn = GetNumberOfActiveWorldItemsFromTempFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, &( uiTotalNumberOfRealItems ) );
03059       Assert( fReturn );
03060 
03061       fReturn = GetNumberOfWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, &( uiTotalNumberOfItems ), FALSE );
03062       Assert( fReturn );
03063 
03064       if( uiTotalNumberOfItems > 0 )
03065       {
03066             // allocate space for the list
03067             pTotalSectorList = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiTotalNumberOfItems );
03068 
03069             // now load into mem
03070             LoadWorldItemsFromTempItemFile(  sMapX,  sMapY, bMapZ, pTotalSectorList );
03071       }
03072 
03073       // now run through list and 
03074       for( iCounter = 0; ( UINT32 )( iCounter )< uiTotalNumberOfRealItems; iCounter++ )
03075       {
03076             // if visible to player, then state fact
03077             if( IsMapScreenWorldItemVisibleInMapInventory( &pTotalSectorList[ iCounter ] ) )
03078             {
03079                   uiItemCount += pTotalSectorList[ iCounter ].o.ubNumberOfObjects;
03080             }
03081       }
03082       
03083       // if anything was alloced, then get rid of it
03084       if( pTotalSectorList != NULL )
03085       {
03086             MemFree( pTotalSectorList );
03087             pTotalSectorList = NULL;
03088       }
03089 
03090       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION   
03091       if( fLoadingGame && guiSaveGameVersion >= 86 )
03092       {
03093             UINT32 uiReported = GetNumberOfVisibleWorldItemsFromSectorStructureForSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
03094 
03095             if( uiItemCount != uiReported )
03096                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"SynchronizeItemTempFile()  Error!  Reported %d, should be %d", uiReported, uiItemCount  );
03097       }
03098       #endif
03099 
03100       //record the number of items
03101       SetNumberOfVisibleWorldItemsInSectorStructureForSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, uiItemCount );
03102 }
03103 
03104 UINT32 UpdateLoadedSectorsItemInventory( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, UINT32 uiNumberOfItems )
03105 {
03106       UINT32      uiCounter;
03107       UINT32      uiItemCounter=0;
03108 
03109       if( !gfWorldLoaded )
03110             return( 0 );
03111 
03112       //loop through all the world items
03113       for( uiCounter= 0; uiCounter < guiNumWorldItems; uiCounter++ )
03114       {
03115             //if the item CAN be visible in mapscreen sector inventory
03116             if( IsMapScreenWorldItemVisibleInMapInventory( &gWorldItems[ uiCounter ] ) )
03117             {
03118                   //increment
03119                   uiItemCounter += gWorldItems[ uiCounter ].o.ubNumberOfObjects;
03120             }
03121       }
03122 
03123       //if the item count is DIFFERENT 
03124       if( uiItemCounter != uiNumberOfItems )
03125       {
03126             //Update the value in the sector info struct
03127             SetNumberOfVisibleWorldItemsInSectorStructureForSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, uiItemCounter );
03128       }
03129 
03130       //return the number of items
03131       return( uiItemCounter );
03132 }
